languages.text:
Allies auto-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Overpenetration{/g} of wearer's weapon is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.

{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Overpenetration{/g} of wearer's weapon is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.

languages.text:
所有盟友会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击。
装备者武器的{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}提高，等同于装备者的{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%。
languages.original_text:

traits.locale_text:
所有盟友会自动{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}射击。
装备者武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}过度穿透{/g}提高，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}<u>弹道技能</u>{/g}%。

languages.text:
Когда персонаж атакует {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, союзники автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняются{/g} от выстрелов.
Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозное пробитие{/g} на {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.
languages.original_text:
Allies auto-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Overpenetration{/g} of wearer's weapon is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж стреляет очередью, союзники автоматически уклоняются от выстрелов.
Увеличивает сквозное пробитие на <u>ДБ</u>%.

Когда персонаж стреляет очередью, союзники автоматически уклоняются от выстрелов.
Увеличивает сквозное пробитие на <u>ДБ</u>%.

languages.text:
味方は使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}連射{/g}攻撃を自動で{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する。
使用者の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}過貫通{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%増加する。
languages.original_text:
Allies auto-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Overpenetration{/g} of wearer's weapon is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.

traits.locale_text:
味方が使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}バースト{/g}攻撃を自動で{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}する。
使用者の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}過貫通{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}<u>BS</u>{/g}％増加する。

languages.text:
Los aliados {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivan{/g} automáticamente los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} del portador.
La {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g} del arma del portador aumenta un {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill} %.
languages.original_text:
Allies auto-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Overpenetration{/g} of wearer's weapon is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.

traits.locale_text:
Los aliados {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivan{/g} automáticamente los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfaga{/g} del portador.
La {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}sobrepenetración{/g} del arma del portador aumenta un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}<u>HP</u>{/g} %

languages.text:
Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weichen{/g} den {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffen{/g} des Trägers automatisch aus.
{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g} der Waffe des Trägers erhöht sich um +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.
languages.original_text:
Allies auto-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Overpenetration{/g} of wearer's weapon is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.

traits.locale_text:
Verbündete werden {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bündel{/g}angriffen des Trägers automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}Überdurchdringung{/g} der Waffe des Trägers wird um {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}<u>BF</u>{/g} % erhöht.

languages.text:
Les alliés {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivent{/g} automatiquement les attaques en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} du porteur.
La {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g} de son arme augmente de +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill} %.
languages.original_text:
Allies auto-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Overpenetration{/g} of wearer's weapon is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.

traits.locale_text:
Les alliés {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivent{/g} automatiquement les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}en rafale{/g} de l'utilisateur.
La {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}surpénétration{/g} de l'arme de l'utilisateur augmente de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}<u>CB</u>{/g} %

La {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g} de son arme augmente de +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}<u>CT</u>{/g} %.

Dost birimler, takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırılarından{/g} otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g}.
Takan kişinin silahının {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}delip geçme{/g} değeri, +%{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill} kadar artar.
